text: Barrington (pronounced ) is a New England town in Bristol County, Rhode Island, United States. The population was 17,153 at the 2020 census. In July 2005, CNN/Money and Money magazine ranked Barrington sixth on its list of the 100 best places to live in the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Town of Barrington Official Web Site * Town of Barrington Official GIS Maps and Property Information * Barrington School Department * The Brendel murders . title: Barrington, Rhode Island
